text:
✓Take care of yourself — eat healthy, get enough sleep and get regular exercise. Consider deep breathing, stretching and meditation exercises( Yoga)

✓Avoid alcohol and drugs.

✓Do something you enjoy, such as reading a book, watching a movie or going on a walk.
